<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recursively write all the subcontexts. We do need to traverse depth first to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// model the context-&gt;subcontext implicitly, and since this captures call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stacks, we don&#39;t really need to be worried about stack overflow and we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// keep the implementation simple.</span></CodeLine>
